modName: Spectral Armaments - Drainspell Bow and Drainblood Battleaxe
summary: A simple, esp-less model replacer for Drainspell Bow and Drainblood Battleaxe. Comes with 3 color variants.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]This mod replaces [b]Drainspell Bow[/b] and [b]Drainblood Battleaxe [/b]models.

[/size][/font][size=4]This is compatible with my other mod, [/size][b][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92118][u][b]Spectral Blades[/b][/u][/url]﻿[/size][/b][size=4], as this doesn't replace the swords (Ghostblade and Drainheart Sword) at all.

This also comes with 3 color variants: [/size][size=4][b]Cyan, Dark Blue and Purple.[/b][/size]





[b]Notes:[/b][size=3] [/size]

[size=3]This mod will also replace the "fxdraugrmagicaxestreak.nif" file for the modified Battleaxe effects.[/size]



[size=3]Although not quite noticeable for the most part, the floating ornaments of Drainspell Bow when fully drawn back if you're attacking was [/size]not[size=3] intended. See last screenshot for reference.[/size]

[i][size=2]You may consider this as another ghost weapon feature that makes this bow more unique or an exclusive function where the ornaments harness the power to drain magicka and stabilize it to a usable state for the user. Other than that, the bow functions as it should.[/size][/i]


[size=4]Check out the other pair of [b]Spectral [/b]weapons![/size]


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92118][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1530264673.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿[/center]



My other weapon mods:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92767][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1532839364.png[/img][/url]
author: Vilidran
